General Project Description
Create an app that shows Melbourne as a map and allows the user to pull up historic information on points of interest.
About Melbourne

Melbourne is located on the south-east edge of Australia and is the capital city of the state of Victoria The entire Melbourne metropolitan area covers 9990.5 km2 and has a population of around 4.5 million. Melbourne hosts over a million international visitors.

Focused around a central business district, metropolitan Melbourne\'s suburbs spread more than 40 km to the south, are hemmed in by the Dandenong ranges 30 km to the east, extend up to 20 km to the north and across vast, flat basalt plains to the west.
Melbourne has a temperate climate influenced by its location at the apex of one of the world\'s largest bays, Port Phillip Bay
About the Team
Our team has consisted of 4 IT students from Deakin University currently enrolled in SIT302 - Project
The team included 3 developers (Ryan, Michel and Michael) and the project team leader/UI designer (Nicole).
